main event: On 15 August 1951, an Air Force pilot reported sighting a luminous disc over the Andes Mountains near Lima, Peru.
interesting points: The object was sighted at an altitude of about 13,000 feet and descended to 8,000-9,000 feet,The disc was visible for about 3 to 5 minutes during the first sighting and about 30 minutes during a second sighting,The pilot estimated the size of the disc to be about 40-50 feet in diameter,The sighting was initially reported by a civilian radio and television station in Lima,The Peruvian Air Force later classified some reports as hoaxes.
witness description: Lt. Col. USAF-P, Pilot of an Air Force C-47 transport
